title: Leaver buster bug?
body:
I have a leaverbuster ban of 10 mins currently and have been playing them out, however i have experienced a few resets and errors resulting in me (and my friends) to have to restart the whole timer again, im currently on my third time trying to get into queue as im writing this.
I'm not asking for it to be removed from my account, just wondering if its just me or there are others who have experienced this and if rito will look into this {{sticker:slayer-pantheon-thumbs}}

replies.body:
Were you or any of your friends perhaps pressing the button under the timer? Did you hav to restart queue when the timer was resetting? When you're on a dodge timer it just closes the timer, but if you're in an LPQ it actually says something like "Leave Queue" and will reset your timer if you press it and leave queue.

The unfortunate thing about LPQ is that it locks you out of the client for the duration, and if you or anyone in the premade clicks that button you're gonna have to restart the whole thing.
